import borders from"assets/theme/base/borders";import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";// Material Dashboard 2 React helper functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";import linearGradient from"assets/theme/functions/linearGradient";var borderWidth=borders.borderWidth,borderColor=borders.borderColor;var transparent=colors.transparent,info=colors.info;var radio={styleOverrides:{root:{"& .MuiSvgIcon-root":{width:pxToRem(20),height:pxToRem(20),color:transparent.main,border:"".concat(borderWidth[1]," solid ").concat(borderColor),borderRadius:"50%"},"&:after":{transition:"opacity 250ms ease-in-out",content:"\"\"",position:"absolute",width:pxToRem(14),height:pxToRem(14),borderRadius:"50%",backgroundImage:linearGradient(info.main,info.main),opacity:0,left:0,right:0,top:0,bottom:0,margin:"auto"},"&:hover":{backgroundColor:transparent.main},"&.Mui-focusVisible":{border:"".concat(borderWidth[2]," solid ").concat(info.main," !important")}},colorPrimary:{color:borderColor,"&.Mui-checked":{color:info.main,"& .MuiSvgIcon-root":{borderColor:info.main},"&:after":{opacity:1}}},colorSecondary:{color:borderColor,"&.Mui-checked":{color:info.main,"& .MuiSvgIcon-root":{borderColor:info.main},"&:after":{opacity:1}}}}};export default radio;
